nimbleEscape.description: Once per turn, you can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on your turn.

furyOfTheSmall.condition: when you hit a creature with an attack and that creature's size is larger than yours

description: Goblins are small, green-skinned humanoids known for their cunning and agility. They often live in large groups, led by a stronger leader, and are notorious for their traps and ambushes. Goblins are adept at sneaking and escaping from danger.
